events.title: Visit the Wat Arun
events.description: After lunch we want to see the bangkok grand palace. There is a ceremony that day!

events.title: Boatride on Chao Phraya river
events.description: I want to make a boat tour on the river, but it's really expansive to go alone! Maybe we go get some dinner together afterwards?

events.title: Bike sightseeing tour
events.description: We want to rent bikes and check out a few sights that are outside the city. Meetup is Chatuchak Market. Bring something to drink for the day

events.title: Eating Pho Noodle Soup in Ru Pho Bar
location: Ru Pho Bar, 27E Tran Nhat Duat
events.description: I heard they have the best Pho in the world, who wants to try it out?

events.title: Fruit Shakes
events.description: They are famous here and incredibly yummy! :)

events.title: Visit the food market
events.description: We want to try out some weird local foods, yummy!!!

events.title: Guards Ceremony at the Grand Palace
events.description: We're Cathy and Bruce and want to watch the Changing of the Guards at the Grand Palace

events.title: Eat fried scorpions
events.description: We are three awesome people from the netherlands. We wanna try out some street food before going partying

events.title: Wat Mahatat
events.description: I want to see the Wat Mahatat, one of the most beautiful buddhist temples in Bangkok. Who's with me?

events.title: Temple of Emerald Buddha
events.description: A must see! If you haven't been there yet, join us!!!

events.title: Khao San Road
events.description: Khao San Road is supposed to be really cool at night. We are four crazy dudes from Denmark, maybe you want to hang with us, go to some bars

events.title: Clubbing Route 66
events.description: We are 2 nice guys from Germany lookin' for some nice girls to go out tonight

events.title: Wat Arun at night
events.description: Its really beatiful at night! Join us for a few beers at the river in front of Wat Arun!

events.title: Glow Nightclub
events.description: We were there yesterday and it was awesome, maybe with a few more people ist going to be even more awesome!

events.title: MachineHead live
events.description: I'm coming over to Bangkok to watch MachineHead. Who's with me.

events.title: Trivago Hackathon 2015
events.description: Have fun, meet peoople, get ideas
